name: La Casa Gaienmae C Harajuku, Omotesando is nearby
summary: This shared flat is locating at very close to Harajuku, Omotesando area. If you enjoy being Harajuku Girl or boy here is the perfect place to stay in. You have 2 flat mates to share a kitchen and bathroom. Monthly rental only.
space: This apartment is 3 bedroom flat shared with two long term residence in Tokyo.   (Hidden by Airbnb) are friendly and mature, no parties or disturbances.   ***NOTE*** Currently now there are long stayers in this flat though please ask me the availability before you reserve room. Room C... about 7 square meter room with a single bed. Please contact me before you booking to make sure. ***NOTE*** Newly refurbished furnished Shared Apartment in fantastic central Tokyo location. With easy access to the city's main areas this is a great opportunity to live in a prime Tokyo location for really good value for money. The extremely safe and pleasant area of Gaienmae boasts stylish restaurants, plenty of sports facilities (Golf, Tennis, Stadiums and a Gym) and is a very green area with parks and many trees. This 3DK apartment is 7 minutes walking distance to Gaienmae Subway station and very close walking distance to Omotosando and Harajuku. Situated on the 4th Floor of a 5 story building the apart

neighborhood_overview: 10 min walking to Harajuku ~ Urahara ~ Omotesando. Everything around here is cool and exciting. Also there are many offices of world wide famous architect
notes: Current tenants are living in this flat over 2 years. So they feel its comfortable place to live in here.
transit: 5min to subway, 10min to JR stations, you can always find taxi around here at any time.
access: Your private room, Kitchen, Bathroom, Toilet, Washing machine, Dryer are available for your use.
interaction: I provide common space cleaning twice a week. Also I am living in a same building though if you need my help you can always see me right away.
house_rules: If you would like to stay monthly, there is a monthly rate which is convenient price than daily rate. Please don't smoke inside of the apartment. Please take of your shoes when you enter. **************************************** Please enjoy your stay.
host_about:
Hi I am Miyuki Kanda. I run a real estate & property management company in Tokyo since 2006.  Nice to meet you and thank you for checking my profile and listings.

I have been using AirBnB since 2011 for my travels in Europe and had a really great time in all the places I stopped over. I really love European cities, food, wine and cheeese!  

Since this website do not support monthly rental apartment my listing you can see online is getting small. However still I manage several different apartments as always and welcoming monthly stayers from all over the world. If you plan to stay in Tokyo over a month please feel free to contact me. I have many different apartments in several areas of Tokyo city. 

As I had no trouble and really enjoyed staying at AirBnB hosts' homes, I decided to provide a similar and even better service in Tokyo. Therefore, I hope my apartments will provide you a pleasant and comfortable stay during your travel to thrilling Tokyo!

If you have any questions or inquiries during your stay, I would be happy to help you. I am looking forward to welcoming you in one of my apartments. :)

name: Oshiage Holiday Apartment
space: We are happy to welcome you to our apartment, located in the heart of Tokyo downtown. This is an authentic Japanese apartment with Tatami mattress room and sleeping on Japanese Futon, like Ryokan style. Fully equipped and convienient kitchen will give you oportunity to feel like at home. Automatic bath tub. Separate toilet with heating seat and washlet. Direct acces from both Narita and Haneda airports. Easy access to most of Tokyo attractions. 10min walk from Oshiage Station, 7min walk from Tobu Hikifune Station, 8min walk from Heisei Hikifune Station. Free internet access. Air conditioning, 2 semi-double futon bed (for 2 person each), LCD 32 inch TV, full kitchen, microwave, toster, electric pot, refrigerator, coffee maker, iron, hair dryer, washing machine, bathroom with a bath tub and shower, gas grill. Cooking utensils and linens provided. Our apartment is located in the center of Tokyo downtown, where you can still taste real traditional Japanese style of living. 3 minutes by sub

Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest. 3. The owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise. 4. Keep the property and all furnishings in good order. 5. Only use appliances for their intended uses. 6. Pets are NOT allowed. 7. Housekeeping: There is no daily housekeeping service. name: Cozy flat #203, local area YET 10 mins to shibuya!
summary: So close to busy centers, yet so peaceful! Just 10 mins with the Local train to shibuya, 3mins to shimokitazawa and local friendly atmosphere. Your PRIVATE and fully furnished flat 25m2 is only 2mins walk to the station. Enjoy relaxing moment on the balcony after busy sightseeing. Free Internet in the flat. Nearby:SHIBUYA-SHIMOKITAZAWA-KICHIJOJI-SHINJUKU-KOEN Other listing: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/3885341
space: Cozy and Relaxing, at home feeling in a residential and friendly neighborhood of shimo-kitazawa(setagaya-ku) Only 10 mins to busy shibuya YET, the flat immediate surrounding is like a  village type atmosphere, peaceful with local shops all around(Fruits & vegetables, fish, bakery, tofu maker, etc...)  PRIVATE fully furnished studio type well equiped, good layout for its compact standard japanese size(25sq.m), sunny and very quiet, with a balcony facing green view. Hanegi park is only 5 mins walk away(tennis court, baseball field, running course…indoor pool is also very close too. No traffic at all. Many guide brochure and a house manual for info about the local shops, trouble shooting etc.. 24 hours Supermarket, convenient stores, banks, japanese izakaya(bistrot) and bars, post office as well as coin laundry, public bath etc… EXCELLENT LOCATION: -3mins WALK to higashi-matsubara(250meters) (your station stop on local inokashira line) -10 mins to shibuya(Keio inokashira line) 4kms away.

Hanegi park is only 5 mins walk away(tennis court, baseball field, running course…indoor pool is also very close too.
neighborhood_overview: Peaceful and residential area just 10 mins away by local train to Shibuya busy center. An Oasis of Calm and refreshing village atmosphere, close to park and all shops.
notes: January - February - July - August: During those months, a daily ¥700 fee has been added to the normal daily rate of our listing, reflecting into a monthly total change at the time of your reservation, to cover the utility cost increase for the heater & air conditioner consumption. We calculated that fee base on the past 5 years average usage from previous guests for that specific period.
transit: 3 mins away to the station. Nice walks all around.
access: It is your own private flat during your stay in tokyo.
interaction: We are very near if needed let us know. Will be always glad to say hi.
house_rules: Please check the following: -Thank you to put a real picture on your profile and provide the name of the other guest staying with you. -Prepare a copy of your passport for us to keep in our file, or send us by e-mail. (the new law in japan requires us to have those on file) -CLEAN set of Sheets and towels are provided, you have a washing machine for any laundry you might want to do.  -Sheets and towels : leave them when you move out we will take care of this. -Key is back to where you found it. -No visitors allowed other than the guests on the reservation booking. -No party.  -No smoking inside(balcony Ok)  -Quiet behaviour especially early and late time for next door resident. -No shoes indoors(slippers provided)  -Follow the garbages disposal days (burnable,non burnable info in english by the disposal area outside)  -Please make sure to switch off the heater,air-con,and lights whenever you go out of the apartment…  -We charge a low cleaning fee(¥3500) this covers only 2 hours of our
host_about:
We are a French-Japanese couple with a 25 y.o son, working between Bangkok and Tokyo and Malo our little dog.
Myself now 29 years in japan!!! Opa!...and originally from france, south west close to Bordeaux(Royan).
We are self employed, our company activities are spherical projection screens rental, foreign production coordination for shooting videos in Japan, house location studio for photo/video shootings(movie, dramas, music videos...) among other things...
We are on and off between Tokyo and Kyushu in our other working base located in Saga prefecture.
Likes guitar, movies, traveling, outdoors, sports, food and wine, photography, interiors, house renovation...

name: TOKYO LAI's HOUSE ITABASHI
summary: LAI's HOUSE was located in a simple Japanese Housing Area with good life style and living facilities.  Our aim is to share our Japanese life experiences and we welcoming all the guests' to coming to experience Japanese style life. We only accept 3 nights or above reservation.
space: Hi,  Thanks for your time. These is a Share Apartment with 5 rooms from Single room to 4 persons room. We running these Share Apartment for 2 years more and until now we NOT receiving any complaining about others guests because our guests are high manner and kind. The bedrooms itself are private space and guests' will be giving a pair of keys. To ensure all the guests' can experiences the Japanese style living here, all the bed and cover will be prepare by using the Japanese fudon and we will arrange it like a Japanese style Home basis. In these house there are 2 shower roooms, 2 toilets and one little living room with kitchen. The area above are Sharing Part with others guests'. We do provided the Wireless WiFi in the house and guests' will be provide the house keys too. For the Kitchen part, sorry to inform you in advance that we are not allow guests' to cooking inside the house as the kitchen is an open style kitchen but can use it for bowling and instants noodles purposes. Smoking
description: LAI's HOUSE was located in a simple Japanese Housing Area with good life style and living facilities.  Our aim is to share our Japanese life experiences and we welcoming all the guests' to coming to experience Japanese style life. We only accept 3 nights or above reservation. Hi,  Thanks for your time. These is a Share Apartment with 5 rooms from Single room to 4 persons room. In these house there are 2 shower roooms, 2 toilets and one little living room with kitchen. The area above are Sharing Part with others guests'. We do provided the Wireless WiFi i
neighborhood_overview: LAI's HOUSE are located in a Japanese Housing area.  People staying here were nice and friendly. Our house area here do have quit lots Japanese Oldies style shop and house.  Compare to the city, is a very relaxing street and not far to the city.  The living facilities here are very good and if you like to explore the Japanese life style, LAI's HOUSE should be one of the recommendation.
transit: From our house to the nearest subway station, Toei Mita line is about 6 minutes by walking. 5 minutes from our house there is a shopping street about 2km. Traditional Japanese Izagaya, restaurant and super market more than 80 shops. From our house to Ikebukuro is about 18 minutes, Shinjuku / Ginza 26 minutes and Shibuya 31 minutes.
access: If you would like to safe the time and start your exploring faster, we can help to arrange the pick up service from the airport. However, extra charges will be apply. From or To Narita airport, the charges is 4000yen per person one way base on booking system. From or To Haneda airport, one way is 12,000yen (max 8 passengers') base on booking system. By public transport ☆From Narita Airport ☆  Take the Skyliner to JR Nippori station ⇒ tranfers to JR Yamanote line to JR Sugamo station ⇒ transfer to the subway Mita line to Itabashi Kuyakusyomae station.
interaction: Our office was located in the share apartment.  During your arrive, me or our staff will be here to welcoming you and have a fast briefing and showing you our cute house area.  Please do let me know your estimation time to arrive to our house and your flight information after you make the reservation.  Looking forward to see you soon.
house_rules: Our house was build in a full Japanese housing area, therefore, after 10 pm, please be manner and don't speak loud or turn the TV sound loudly. Further, we strictly prohibit smoking in the house. Kitchen can be use under terms and condition.
host_about:
Hi everyone, I'm Ryan. Nice to meet you all.
I'm came from Malaysia and running hostel business with my wife and our team members for six year.

On behalf of Hostel business, we had expanded our business in Japan Travel and had registered under the Japan Tourism Department as a Japan Travel Agency.

Our aim is not just to provide a clean and tidy environment to every guests of us but also let them feel as good as stay like your home and have a good memories during travel at Tokyo.

Simple, Enjoy, Warming is our slogan.

Looking forward to meet all of you soon !

name: Kero-kero house room 1
summary: We have been in airbnb since 2011 and it has given us many new opportunity to meet and learn everyday.  It is a private room with a toilet just beside the room.  We have now in airbnb experience.  If you are interested in making bento and gyoza please let us know so we can send you the link for booking.  Thank you very much.
space: INTRO ε(*´･･`)зﾞHey"ε(´･･`*)з *TAKE NOTE*  Just a few Notes to inform.  From June 15 we have certified for home sharing. New law have enforced in Japan for home sharing.  We are certified for Home sharing.  We hope people would come enjoy Japan and and to learn about Japanese culture.  Please let us know if you have questions. We have also varieties of airbnb experience to do together.  Please let us know if you have interest in Gyoza making, Bento making, Jinbei making and Needle felting. Sorry for mobile wiFi, recently we have problems a lot with mobile wiFi therefore we have canceled the contract. We have house wifi.  In Tokyo most places have free wifi. Please let us know if you have more questions.  1)We are friendly, open minded and opens our door to the world.  But hope for understanding.. we received a lot of guests emails.. so we hope for kind guests with photos and self introduce. neighborhood_overview: We love Nishinippori because is nearer to Tokyo which we are fond of parks and more comfortable space.
notes: Please do not press any buttons around. If not sure please always ask us. We are happy to explain many times.  Because if simply pressing the buttons around.. it may cause inconveniences to other guests or to your partners.  especially the toilet and shower room.  We apologise as only in Japanese.. :( But just let us know we are happy to assist all the time!
transit: JR Yamanote, Keihin Tohoku or Chiyoda line is recommend. The nearest station to Ueno or Nippori is Shinmikawashima station.
access: Living and Dining room Please do not use or go into the kitchen to cook or take anything without asking.  We will describe it in House Rules.
interaction: We like to have fun time with guests.  To have lovely home cook meal and fun time handcrafts.  Please let us know if any of your interest that you have in your stay, we are happy to share and learn from each other.
house_rules: We trust our guests for their visit and love of Japan! Rule #1 Strictly NO smoking in the room or house.  But allow to smoke outside.  You may smoke nearby the convenience store 1 min walk from the house. Rule#2 Please keep voice low after 10pm.  Japanese house is very close to each other therefore please lower voice if possible  Example: if you need to talk on webcam please use headphone or watch TV/Youtube but also please keep low. IF you need to use the toilet or going and out, keep it gentle. Rule#3 Garbage/Trash Please do not mix the PET bottles (mineral bottles, drinking bottle in the trash) Cans and glass bottles are need to recycle. Japan is very strict on recycle, sorry about it.. but please let us know if you need more to understand. everywhere in Tokyo you go, please respect to throw things. We have prepared a box near the staircase beside the shoes area. Just leave the recycle item beside the box or let us know if you need to dispose. Rule#4 Please be very careful with the
host_about:
Love culture/foods/anime and to know about other countries people. 

We likes handmade.
Kei likes cooking (❀◕∇◕)爻(◕∇◕❀)

... felting, knitting, sewing, zakka.., coffee art (anything that is handmade)
Kotaro likes making pottery and origami!
✾“ヽ(*♥д♥*)ﾉ”✾
You can book us on airbnb experience for bento making, gyoza, needle felting and Japanese yukata/jinbei summer wear. from 0-3 years old available.
Let us know we can make the schedule for you during your stay.

Kotaro is IT software engineer. We both met in the same work place.
Kei now is busy with her crafts and Miya. 

We are a small family who enjoy outing a lot.
If you are interested in Japanese cooking, Origami, Felting, 
please let us know. 
we can arrange time to do together.. (FUN TIME) 

Our dream is to have our own guest house 
with our little hand craft cafe serving our homemade Japanese food
..taught by our mothers, grandmothers..

  ∧,,∧
(;`･ω･)  ｡･ﾟ･⌒) ﾁｬｰﾊﾝ作るよ!!
/   o━ヽﾆﾆﾌ))
しｰ-J

We created F.B/Instagram for our kero kero house (guest only)..
feel free to add us with introduction!

We love natures/photos and everything that is cute (@^.^@)
AND to get to know us more, add us on LINE after your confirmation!
we will keep you update on Tokyo's weather/festival. 

Let us know!!
Hope to share and learn more!
Thanks for your interest and time looking at our page!

name: RELAX AT HOME:Shimo 5'/Shibuya 10'
summary: Monthly private fully furnished house, cozy and relaxing place, almost like a village atmosphere you will experience the city like a local, 3 mins to Meidaemae station and from there within 10mins to Shibuya, Shinjuku busy centers. Excellent location, there is no "downtown", but many centers in Tokyo.
space: Nice LITTLE house with atmosphere in Tokyo. Best for long stay and super convenient AREA in tokyo! 3 mins walk to the station and then5 mins to Shimo-kitazawa!(express) 8mins(local)... to Shibuya 6 mins (express), 12mins (local). Entire place, can host 2 guests, couple or friends. To make sure I write again not to missunderstand with guests:it is a SMAAALLL  House :) 45m2 on 2 floors. Many pictures for you to see...the staircase is STIFF also(see the picture). SURROUNDING: Very quiet area, residential yet SUPER central! 200 meters from many shops, the local train station etc... LOCATION: Meidaemae station can brings you direct to Shinjuku or Shibuya center(2 lines). Timing is FROM the station. (Add 3mins to reach the house) Inokashira line: -10 mins to Shibuya station -5 mins to Shimokitazawa  !!! -20 mins to Kichijoji station. (great place to visit & where the ghibli museum is) Keio line: -10 mins to Shinjuku. -38 mins Mount Takao, Tokyo hiking trail. -72mins to Kamakura area/Enoshima

neighborhood_overview: It is a residential area and very quiet place but with all the facilities around within about 200 meters as well as a 12 mins walk to hanegi park.
notes: January - February - July - August: During those months, a daily ¥700 fee has been added to the normal daily rate of our listing, reflecting into a monthly total change at the time of your reservation, to cover the utility cost increase for the heater & air conditioner consumption. We calculated that fee base on the past 5 years average usage from previous guests for that specific period.
transit: We are at the crossing of 2 lines :Keio line going to shinjuku and Inokashira line going to shibuya. Walk to the Meidaemae station is just 3 mins . You can also reach Kichijoji(ghibli museum,about 20 mins by train or go for an afternoon hiking at Mount Takao(keio line:45 mins and very nice BUT AVOID week ends!) Don't forget to check Airbnb visit tips  for Tokyo https://www.airbnb.com/locations/tokyo/neighborhoods
access: You will have access to everything in the house, small but well equipped, and well organized, but not the Ritz Carlton:)
interaction: We are on event overseas or on holiday or not too far away during your stay but always reachable.
house_rules: -Please check the following: Update your profile with a real picture if not already, as well as name of the guest staying with you. -Prepare a copy of your passport for us to keep in our file, or send us by e-mail. (the new law in japan requires us to have those on file) You should have downloaded already from our website the pdf for directions and info, it was in your airbnb message at your reservation confirmation. -Thank you to inform about your estimate Arrival and Departure time if you already know. -Keep clean, neighboors are really close by and it is a very residential area....expecting quiet lifestyle while indoor and respect people privacy. -No visitors allowed (unless special arrangement with us) -No party. -Very important:Keep garbages days "rules" and type(info on the fridge) when putting outside at designated time and area only. -Absolutely NO smoking in the house or nearby the house too. -Shoes off while indoor. -We charge a reasonably low cleaning fee(¥5000) this covers
host_about:
We are a French-Japanese couple with a 25 y.o son, working between Bangkok and Tokyo and Malo our little dog.
Myself now 29 years in japan!!! Opa!...and originally from france, south west close to Bordeaux(Royan).
We are self employed, our company activities are spherical projection screens rental, foreign production coordination for shooting videos in Japan, house location studio for photo/video shootings(movie, dramas, music videos...) among other things...
We are on and off between Tokyo and Kyushu in our other working base located in Saga prefecture.
Likes guitar, movies, traveling, outdoors, sports, food and wine, photography, interiors, house renovation...

name: Classy room @Shinjuku, Takadanoba
summary: ..*+;.*:' Popular room in Airbnb@Tokyo *;+:..* => 95% of guests wrote a positive review :) Good location, modern designed private apartment, along JR Yamanote line, the most useful train in Tokyo! 9min walk from Takadanobaba station (2stops from Shinjuku), Many restaurants around the station!
space: Walkable from Shinjuku station even if you miss the last train. With a classy designed building, you can enjoy a neo-Tokyo stay. The house is 9 minutes from Takadanobaba station along Yamanote-line. From Takadanobaba, you can go to Shinjuku by 5 minutes, to Shibuya by 12 minutes! Even if you miss the last train, you can go back from Shinjuku on foot. (There are so many attractive night spots like bars or restaurants in Shinjuku.) Takadanobaba is really nice place to live. You can buy any groceries and also has many good restaurants. I usually eat out around there so if you want to know, please ask me! This one is one of my house but I also managing a monthly apartment for foreign residents. So I'm mostly understanding about troubles or difficulties for foreigners. Hope you can have a nice stay and want you to know many good points about Japan!

transit: 9 min walk to JR Takadanobaba station Toyama exit. Takadanobaba is along the JR Yamanote line, very convenient to go to a big city such as Shinjuku, Harajuku, Shibuya, Ikebukuro.
access: Please come to my cafe to receive a key and write a contract paper. My cafe is about 5 min walk from JR Takadanobaba station, 15 min walk to the apartment.
interaction: You can come to my cafe anytime you want! We always have people who can speak English (or some other languages) well
house_rules: Please take off your shoes in the room.
host_about: I've been around center in Tokyo for 15 years. I often go out with my foreign friends so I can tell you nice places which are not in guide books! Also I often go out for dinner or lunch so please ask me if you want nice restaurants!

name: 4F - Near Shinjuku & Shibuya w/Free WiFi
summary: License M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Entire apartment (not shared) located in the vibrant neighborhood of Hatagaya, 3 minutes on train or 15 minutes walking to Shinjuku. Easy access to Shibuya / Shinjuku & fits up to 6 guests. The calendar is always up to date. The apartment has 40+ sq mts / 450+ sq ft, 2 bedrooms, 1 living and dining room. Simply put: it's TWICE as big as most apartments in Shinjuku & Shibuya and features free ADSL Wifi & 1 portable Wifi so you can always stay connected. Don't miss out!
space: Welcome and thank you for reading the details that follow, as they can help answer most common questions. If you are new to Airbnb and do not have a profile. Use the following link to create your profile and make your first reservation and get immediate credit that can be used in your first booking:  https://www.airbnb.com/c/abonilla9?s=41  A few things before you start:  1.	I have been in the shared economy community for over 3 years and have come to learn a lot about how it works. I suggest that while comparing my apartments you take into consideration the size, location and ownership. This apartment is 7 minutes from Shinjuku in the heart of Tokyo, very spacious and owned. Only owned properties are LEGAL in Japan and these are the only headache free properties.  2.	My calendar is always up to date and ready for your to book instantly at your convenience when available. (Please note the apartment has self-booking enabled so it’s first come first served.)  3.	Check-in and check-out in
description: License M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Entire apartment (not shared) located in the vibrant neighborhood of Hatagaya, 3 minutes on train or 15 minutes walking to Shinjuku. Easy access to Shibuya / Shinjuku & fits up to 6 guests. The calendar is always up to date. The apartment has 40+ sq mts / 450+ sq ft, 2 bedrooms, 1 living and dining room. Simply put: it's TWICE as big as most apartments in Shinjuku & Shibuya and features free ADSL Wifi & 1 portable Wifi so you can always stay connected. Don't miss out! Welcome and thank you for reading the details that follow, as they can help answer most common questions. If you are new to Airbnb and do not have a profile. Use the following link to create your profile and make your first reservation and get immediate credit that can be used in your first booking:  https://www.airbnb.com/c/abonilla9?s=41  A few things before you start:  1.	I have been in the shared economy community for over 3 years and have come to learn a lot about how it work
neighborhood_overview: Hatagaya is a great neighborhood located 4 minutes by train train from Shinjuku (15-20 minutes walking). It is extremely lively by any international standards but not as crowded a Shinjuku. It features dozens of family restaurants, convenience stores and bars open 24X7.
transit: Getting in from the Narita International Airport is a breeze where I recommend you take either the Narita Express (a.k.a NEX) or the Limousine bus to Shinjuku and then a cab for about 10 minutes to the apartment (The cab should be between 15 and 20 USD for up to 4 passengers).  If you are traveling from Haneda it is even faster. If you a family that has between 2 and 4 members I recommend taking a cab from Haneda Airport directly. This would be around 90 USD with tolls under a new fixed-price program. Otherwise you can also take the Limousine bus to Shinjuku and then cab it to the apartment from Shinjuku. On the transport front this apartment is serviced by Toei Shinjuku; where the closest train station is Hatagaya located 6 minutes away walking from the apartment:    Train times to common tourist's spots from Hatagaya Station include:  Shinjuku: 4 minutes  Yoyogi: 10 minutes  Shibuya: 17 minutes (There is also a bus that gets you to Shibuya in 15 minutes)  Roppongi: 18 minutes  Iwamot
access: This 2 bedroom apartment is entirely yours to enjoy (i.e.: NO sharing with other families). This includes:  - 1 bedroom that can be setup with 1 queen bed or 2 semi-single beds.  - 1 bedroom with a single bed; where a futon can be placed in addition as needed.  - 1 Kitchen with refrigerator, gas cooker, toaster and a microwave.  - 1 unit bath shower room with a toilet - 1 HVAC systems to cool and warm the whole apartment.   - 1 Washing machine  - Free ADSL Internet accessible on a wireless network in the apartment - 1 Free wireless portable WiFi running with 300 KB on ETL. (very fast internet).
interaction: Throughout your stay, I will be reachable via instant messaging services such as (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), Line, Viber and/or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) primarily. I usually respond to messages after 19:00 hrs. local time. For emergencies, I also try to make myself available throughout the day but I do ask for your patience if I don’t attend to the phone immediately.
house_rules: BASIC ====== 1. Based on the latest rules passed by Japan you will need to provide a digital copy/image of the passports of all members staying at the property.  2. Do yourself and the environment a (URL HIDDEN) Smoking inside the apartment! 3. Japan is all about looking after your neighbors so please keep it down after 21:00 hrs. 4. Japan is also about recycling so please throw out the garbage on the required days as per the manual in the apartment. 5. Appreciate your help keeping the apartment clean as the cleaning fees included are only for basic cleaning and sheet/towel replacement that happens at the end of the stay. 6. Depending on length of your stay you may be required to care for the bed-linen and towels (ie: you may have to care for the laundry of these)    7. Please mind the following CHECK OUT instructions ========== The Check out time is at 11:00 am; but in case you have plans to leave earlier please let me know. As you prepare for check out please: i. Leave the WiFi fees
host_about: A host backed up by a team of professional cleaners looking to help you feel at home!
